titleStmt.title: To the ld. mayor & other justices & aldermen of the city of London, the case of the prisoners, commonly called Quakers in the said city, humbly presented

notesStmt.note: Dated: From Newgate and Woodstreet Compter, this 5th of the 10th month, 1684.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: stained and torn, possibly cropped, with loss of print. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
